divy31:7: tatra bhagavbānāyuṣmantamāmantrayate—sma āgamaya ānanda yena śrāavastīti |
divy31:9: atha bhagavān yena śrāvastī tena cārikāṁ prakrāntaḥ |
divy31:10: yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe brāhmaṇaśchinnabhakto halaṁ vāhayati, tasyārthāya dārikā peyāmādāya gatā |
divy31:12: dadarśa sa brāhmaṇo buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakcaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtamaśītyānuvyañjanairvirājitagātraṁ vyāmaprabhālaṁkṛtaṁ sūryasahasrātirekaprabhaṁ jaṅgamamiva ratnaparvataṁ samantato bhadrakam |
divy31:14: na tathā dvādaśavarṣābhyastaḥ śamathaścattasya kalyatāṁ janayati, aputrasya vā putrapratilambhaḥ, daridrasya vā nidhidarśanam, rājyābhinandano vā rājyābhiṣekaḥ, yathopacitakuśalamūlasya sattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam |
divy31:15: sa tāṁ peyāmādāya laghuladhveva yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntaḥ |
divy31:18: tato bhagavatā brāhmaṇasya jīrṇakūpo darśitah—sacette brāhmaṇa parityaktā, asmiñ jīrṇakūpe prakṣipeti |
divy31:20: sa jīrṇakūpo vāpyāyamānaḥ peyāpūrṇaḥ, yathāpi tadbuddhānāṁ buddhānubhāvena devatānāṁ ca devatānubhāvena |
divy31:21: tato bhagavatā sa brāhmaṇo ’bhihitah—cāraya mahābrāhmaṇa peyāmiti |
divy31:23: bhagavatā tathā adhiṣṭhitā yathā sarvasaṁghena pītā |
divy31:25: tato ’sau brāhmaṇo bhūyasyā mātrayā abhiprasanno bhagavataḥ pādābhivandanaṁ kṛtvā purastānniṣaṇṇo dharmaśravaṇāya |
divy31:26: tasya bhagavatā āśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāyasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṁ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṁ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy31:28: eṣo ’haṁ bhagavantaṁ buddhaṁ śaraṇaṁ gacchāmi dharmaṁ ca bhikṣusaṁghaṁ ca |
divy31:29: upāsakaṁ ca māṁ dhāraya adyāgreṇa yāvajjīvaṁ prāṇopetaṁ śaraṇaṁ gatamabhiprasannam |
divy31:30: athāsau brāhmaṇo vaṇigiva labdhalābhaḥ śasyasampanna iva kṛṣīvalaḥ śūra iva vijitasaṁgrāmaḥ sarvaroganirmukta ivāturo bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyānandyānumodya bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā bhagavato ’ntikāt prakrānto yāvatkṣetraṁ gataḥ |
divy31:31: paśyati tasmin kṣetre sauvarṇān yavān saṁpannān |
divy31:32: dṛṣṭvā ca punarvismayotphullalocano gāthāṁ bhāṣate— aho guṇamayaṁ kṣetraṁ sarvadoṣavivarjitam |
divy31:35: upasaṁkramya jayenāyuṣā vardhayitvā rājānamuvāca—deva, mayā yavāḥ prakīrṇāḥ, te sauvarṇāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy31:49: tatastena brāhmaṇena parituṣṭena yaddattam, tatsauvarṇāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy31:52: yāvadanyatamasmin pradeśe pañcakārṣaśatānyutpāḍūtpāṇḍukāni sphuṭitapāṇipādāni śaṇaśāṭīnivāsitāni laṅgalāni vāhayanti |
divy31:53: te ’pi balīvardā baddhaiḥ prayoktraiḥ pratodayaṣṭibhiḥ kṣatavikṣatagātrā muhurmuhur niśvasanto vahanti |
divy31:54: tadṛśuste kārṣākā buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtaṁ pūrvavadyāvadupacitakuśalamūlasattvasya tatprathamato buddhadarśanam |
divy31:57: dṛṣṭvā ca punarvineyāpekṣayā mārgādapakramya purastādbhikṣusaṁghasya prajñapta evāsane niṣaṇṇaḥ |
divy31:58: eta kārṣakā bhagavataḥ pādau śirasā vanditvā ekāntaniṣaṇṇāḥ |
divy31:59: tato bhagavatā teṣāṁ kārṣakāṇāmāśayānuśayaṁ dhātuṁ prakṛtiṁ ca jñātvā tādṛśī caturāryasatyasamprativedhikī dharmadeśanā kṛtā, pūrvavadyāvadanādikālopacitaṁ satkāyadṛṣṭiśailaṁ jñānavajreṇa bhittvā srotāapattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy31:61: praṇamayya bhagavantamidamavocat—deśaya bhadanta, svākhyāte dharmavinaye pravrajyāmupasampadaṁ bhikṣubhāvam |
divy31:63: te bhagavatā ehibhikṣukayā pravrājitāḥ pūrvavadyāvatte ’vasthitā buddhamanorathena |
divy31:66: te ’pi balīvardā yoktrāṇi varatrāṇi ca cchittvā yena bhagavāṁstenopasaṁkrāntāḥ |
divy31:68: teṣāṁ bhagavatā tribhiḥ padārthairdharmo deśitaḥ pūrvavadyāvadyathā gaṅgāvatāre haṁsamatsyakūrmāṇām yāvad dṛṣṭasatyāḥ svarbhavanaṁ gatāḥ |
divy31:70: bhikṣavaḥ saṁśayajātāḥ sarvasaṁśayacchettāraṁ buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ papracchuh—kiṁ nu taiḥ kārṣakapūrvakairbhikṣubhiḥ karma kṛtam yena kārṣakāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ, bhagavataśca śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam? tairbalīvardapūrvakairdevaputraiḥ kiṁ karma kṛtam, yana balīvardeṣūpapannāḥ, satyadarśanaṁ ca kṛtamiti? bhagavānāha—ebhireva bhikṣavaḥ karmāṇi kṛtānyupacitāni labdhasambhārāṇi pūrvavadyāvatphalanti khalu dehinām |
divy31:72: bhūtapūrvaṁ bhikṣavo ’sminneva bhadrakalpe viṁśativarṣasahasrāyuṣi prajāyāṁ kāśyapo nāma śāstā loka udapādi |
divy31:75: tasya śāsane etāni pañca karṣakaśatāni pravrajitānyabhūvan |
divy31:76: tatraibhir na paṭhitaṁ na svādhyāyitaṁ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ |
divy31:77: kiṁ tu śraddhādeyaṁ bhuktvā bhuktvā saṁgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenābhināmitam |
divy31:79: kiṁ manyadhve bhikṣavo yāni tāni pañca bhikṣuśatāni, etānyeva tāni pañca karṣakaśatāni |
divy31:80: yo ’sau vihārasvāmī, sa evāsau gṛhapatiryasyaite kārṣahāḥ |
divy31:81: yadebhirvihārasvāmisantakaṁ śraddhādeyaṁ paribhujya na paṭhitaṁ na svādhyāyitaṁ nāpi manasikāro vihitaḥ, kiṁ tu saṁgaṇikābhirataiḥ kausīdyenābhināmitam, tena karmaṇā pañca janmaśatāni tasya vihārasvāminaḥ kārṣakāḥ saṁvṛttāḥ |
divy31:83: yadebhiḥ kāśayapasya samyaksambuddhāsya śāsane pravrajya brahmacaryaṁ caritam, tenaitarhi mama śāsane pravrajya sarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy31:84: te ca balīvardapūrviṇo devaputrāḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śāsane pravrajitā āsan |
divy31:88: yatkāśyape samyaksambuddhe brahmacaryaṁ vāsitam, tenedānīṁ devaputrabhūtaiḥ satyadarśanaṁ kṛtam |
divy31:89: iti bhikṣava ekāntakṛṣṇānāṁ karmaṇāmekāntakṛṣṇo vipākaḥ, pūrvavadyāvadābhogaḥ karaṇīyaḥ |
divy31:92: tatra bhagavānāyucmantamāmantrayate sma—āgamaya ānanda yena toyikā |
divy31:96: athāsau dadarśa buddhaṁ bhagavantaṁ dvātriṁśatā mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇaiḥ samalaṁkṛtagātraṁ pūrvavadyāvatsamantato bhadrakam |
divy31:97: dṛṣṭvā saṁlakṣayati—yadi bhagavantaṁ gautamamupetya abhivādayiṣyāmi, karmaparihāṇirme bhaviṣyati |
divy31:99: tatko ’sāvupāyaḥ syādyena me na karmaparihāṇi syānnāpi puṇyaparihāṇiriti? tasya buddhirutpannā—atrastha evābhivādanaṁ karomi |
divy31:101: tena yathāgṛhītayaiva pratodayaṣṭyā tatrasthenābhivādanaṁ kṛtam—abhivādaye buddhaṁ bhagavantam |
divy31:106: evamanena dvābhyāṁ samyaksambuddhābhyāṁ vandanā kṛtā bhavet |
divy31:107: tatkasya hetoh? asminn ānanda pradeśe kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopito ’sthisaṁghātastiṣṭhatīti |
divy31:108: athāyuṣmānānando laghulaghveva caturguṇamuttarāsaṅgaṁ prajñapya bhagavantamidamavocat—niṣīdatu bhagavān prajñapta evāsane |
divy31:109: evamayaṁ pṛthivīpradeśo dvābhyāṁ samyaksambuddhābhyāṁ paribhukto bhaviṣyati, yacca kāśyapena samyaksambuddhena, yaccaitarhi bhagavateti |
divy31:111: niṣadya bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—icchatha yūyaṁ bhikṣavaḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṁghātamavikopitaṁ draṣṭum? etasya bhagavan kālaḥ, etasya sugata samayo ’yam |
divy31:112: bhagavān bhikṣūṇāṁ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasyāvikopitaṁ śarīrasaṁghātamupadarśayatu, dṛṣṭvā bhikṣavaścittamabhiprasādayiṣyanti |
divy31:114: dharmatā khalu yasmin samaye buddhā bhagavanto laukikam  cittamutpādayanti, tasmin samaye kuntapipīlikādayo ’pi prāṇino bhagavataścetasā cittamājānanti |
divy31:115: nāgāḥ saṁlakṣayanti—kiṁ kāraṇaṁ bhagavatā laukikaṁ cittamutpāditam? bhagavān kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṁghātamavikopitaṁ draṣṭukāmaḥ |
divy31:117: tatra bhagavān bhikṣūnāmantrayate sma—gṛhṇīta bhikṣavo nimittam |
divy31:121: rājñā prasenajitā śrutam—bhagavatā śrāvakāṇāṁ darśanāya avikopitaḥ kaśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śarīrasaṁghāta ucchrāpita iti |
divy31:122: śrutvā ca punaḥ kutūhalajātaḥ sārdhamantah—pureṇa kumārauramātyairbhaṭabalāgrair naigamajanapadaiśca draṣṭuṁ saṁprasthitaḥ |
divy31:123: evaṁ virūḍhako ’nāthapiṇḍado gṛhapatiḥ, ṛṣidattaḥ purāṇasthapatiḥ, viśākhā mṛgaramātā, anekāni ca prāṇiśatasahasrāṇi kutūhalajātāni draṣṭuṁ saṁprasthitāni pūrvakaiśca kuśalamūlaiḥ saṁcodyamānāni |
divy31:125: taiḥ śrutam—antarhito ’sau bhagavataḥ kāśyapasya samyaksambuddhasya śīrarasaṁghāta iti |
divy31:126: śrutvā ca punasteṣāṁ duḥkhadaurmanasyamutpannam—vṛthā asmākamāgamanaṁ jātamiti |
divy31:129: evaṁ cetasā cittamabhisaṁskṛtam—asmānme padāvihārāt kiyatpuṇyaṁ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṁstasya mahājanakāyasyāvipratisārasaṁjananārthaṁ tasya copāsakasya cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṁ bhāṣite— śataṁsahasrāṇi suvarṇaniṣkā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
divy31:130: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ padāvihāraṁ prakaroti vidvān (2)|
divy31:133: asya tu mṛttikāpiṇḍasya kiyatpuṇyaṁ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṁs tasyāpi cittamājñāya gāthāṁ bhāṣate— śataṁsahasrāṇi suvarṇapiṇḍaṁ jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
divy31:137: aparaistatra muktapuṣpāṇi kṣiptāni, evaṁ cittamabhisaṁskṛtam—padāvihārasya mṛttikāpiṇḍasya ceyatpuṇyamuktaṁ bhagavatā, asmākaṁ tu muktapuṣpāṇāṁ kiyatpuṇyaṁ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṁsteṣāmapi cittamājñāya gāthāṁ bhāṣate—śataṁsahasrāṇi suvarṇamūḍhaṁ jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
divy31:140: aparaistatra mālāvihāraḥ kṛtaḥ, cittaṁ cābhisaṁskṛtam—muktapuṣpāṇāṁ bhagavatā iyatpuṇyamuktam |
divy31:141: asmākaṁ mālāvihārasya kiyatpuṇyaṁ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṁsteṣāmapi cittamājñāya gāthāṁ bhāṣate— śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇavāhā jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
divy31:142: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto mālāvihāraṁ prakaroti vidvān (5)|
divy31:144: aparaistatra dīpamālā dattā, cittaṁ cābhisaṁskṛtam—mālāvihārasya bhagavatā iyatpuṇyamuktam |
divy31:145: asmākaṁ pradīpadānasya kiyatpuṇyaṁ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṁsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṁ bhāṣate— śataṁsahasrāṇi suvarṇakoṭyo jāmbūnadā nāsy bhavanti |
divy31:146: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacittaḥ pradīpadānaṁ prakaroti vidvān (6)|
divy31:148: aparaistatra gandhābhiṣeko dattaḥ, cittaṁ cābhisaṁskṛtam—pradīpadānasya bhagavatā iyat puṇyamuktam |
divy31:149: asmākaṁ gandhābhiṣekasya kiyatpuṇyaṁ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṁsteṣāṁ cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṁ bhāṣate— śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇāśayo jāmbūnadā nāsya samā bhavanti |
divy31:150: yo buddhacaityeṣu prasannacitto gandhābhiṣekaṁ prakaroti vidvān (7)|
divy31:152: aparaistatra dhvajapatākāropaṇaṁ kṛtam, cittaṁ cābhisaṁskṛtam—padavihārasya mṛtpiṇḍadānasya, muktapuṣpāṇāṁ mālavihārasya pradīpadānasya gandhābhiṣekasya ca iyatpuṇyamuktaṁ bhagavatā, āsmākaṁ chatradhvajapatākāropaṇasya kiyatpuṇyaṁ bhaviṣyatīti? atha bhagavāṁsteṣāṁ cittamājñāya gāthāṁ bhāṣate—śatasahasrāṇi suvarṇaparvatā meroḥ samā nāsya bhavanti |
divy31:154: eṣāṁ hi dakṣiṇā proktā aprameye tathāgate |
divy31:157: teṣāmetadabhavat—parinirvṛtasya tāvadbhagavataḥ pūjākaraṇādi yatpuṇyamuktaṁ bhagavatā, tiṣṭhataḥ kiyatpuṇyaṁ bhaviṣyatīti |
divy31:158: atha bhagavāṁsteṣāmapi cetasā cittamājñāya gāthāṁ bhāṣate— tiṣṭhantaṁ pūjayedyacca yaccāpi parinirvṛtam |
divy31:164: tato bhagavatā tasya mahājanakāyasya tathāvidhā dharmadeśanā kṛtā, yām anekaiḥ prāṇiśatasahasrairmahān viśeṣo ’dhigataḥ |
divy31:165: kaiścicchrāvakabodhau cittānyutpāditāni, kaiścit pratyekabodhau, kaiściduṣmagatāni pratilabdhāni, kaiścid mūrdhānaḥ, kaiścitsatyānulomaḥ kṣāntyaḥ, kaiścicchrotāapattiphalaṁ sākṣātkṛtam, kaiścitsakṛdāgāmiphalam, kaiścidanāgāmiphalam, kaiścitsarvakleśaprahāṇādarhattvaṁ sākṣātkṛtam |
divy31:166: yadbhūyasā sā parṣadbuddhaniṁnā dharmapravaṇā saṁghaprāgbhārā vyavasthitā |
divy31:167: sārdhaṁ tatra brāhmaṇagṛhapatibhistasmin pradeśe mahaḥ sthāpitah—toyikāmahastoyikāmaha iti saṁjñā saṁvṛttā |
